channel.title: Posts on Zeeshan's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Zeeshan's Blog

item.title: GSoC'21 : Week 5
item.description: Cache efficiency Hello Everyone! Some good news, the first evaluations happened from 12th-16th of July and I aced them! Last time I demonstrated my first sub-goal (Vector Calculus Operators) and how my next task was to optimize the code.

item.title: GSoC'21 : Approaching the First Evaluations
item.description: Vector Calculus Operators Hey guys! It has been some time since I last updated you since the community bonding period. Well, I’ve been pretty busy diving in some exciting stuff :P.

item.title: Commencing GSoC'21 with NumFOCUS
item.description: GSoC'21 : NumFOCUS In response to my contributions for about 4 months to SciML Org, I was absolutely thrilled when informed about my selection in this year’s GSoC on 17th May, 2021.
